title: LRD user able to see notifications widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN the LRD wants to view the notifications they receive
custom_steps: WHEN they log in
custom_expected: THEN they can view the notifications widget on their dashboard

title: Club user able to see notifications widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club wants to view the notifications they receive
custom_steps: WHEN a club logs in
custom_expected: THEN they can view the notifications widget on dashboard

title: Club Admin receives notification when Contract is moved from higher state to Preliminary
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a contract in a state higher then Preliminary
custom_steps: WHEN that contract is moved back to a status of Preliminary
custom_expected: THEN the club admin receives a notification on their clipboard

title: Club Admin receives notification when MJC is moved to Terms Confirmed
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a contract in the Preliminary state
custom_steps: WHEN that contract is moved to Terms Confirmed
custom_expected: THEN the club admin receives a notification on their clipboard

title: Club receives notification when MJC is moved from Ready for Signature to Ready for Signature (Terms Confirmed)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a contract is in the Ready for Signature state
custom_steps: WHEN that contract is moved to Ready for Signature (Terms Confirmed)
custom_expected: THEN a club receives a notification on their widget

title: Club receives notification when MJC is moved to Approved
custom_preconds: GIVEN a contract is in any lower state other than Approved
custom_steps: WHEN that contract is moved to Approved
custom_expected: THEN a club receives a notification on their widget

title: Club receives notification when MJC is moved to Approved for Next Year
custom_preconds: GIVEN a contract has not yet been Approved
custom_steps: WHEN a contract is moved to Approved for Next Year
custom_expected: THEN a club receives a notification on their notification widget

title: Club receives notification when MJC is moved to Voided
custom_preconds: GIVEN a contract is in an Approved state
custom_steps: WHEN a contract is moved to Voided
custom_expected: THEN a club receives a notification on their notification widget

title: Club receives notification when MJC is moved to expired (manually- not by batch)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a contract is in an Approved
custom_steps: WHEN a contract is moved to Expired
custom_expected: THEN a club receives a notification on their notification widget

title: Sort order of Notifications widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to find something specific on their notification widget
custom_steps: WHEN they sort their widget
custom_expected: THEN it is sorted by date/time of the transaction

title: User can delete notification from Notifications widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is an item on a users notification clipboard they want to delete
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects a row on clipboard
AND clicks delete
custom_expected: THEN item is deleted

title: Notifications widget is unique to user
custom_preconds: GIVEN multiple different users login
custom_steps: WHEN they view their notification widget
custom_expected: THEN they can see each notification is different pending on the user

title: Open Preliminary contract from Notifications Widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a Preliminary contract on a users notification widget
custom_steps: WHEN a user clicks the description of the given contract
custom_expected: THEN the contract loads in edit mode

title: Open Terms confirmed Contract from Notifications Widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a contract in the Terms Confirmed state on a users notification widget
custom_steps: WHEN a user clicks the description of the given contract
custom_expected: THEN the contract loads in view mode

title: Open MJC contract that was moved from Ready for Signature to Ready for Signature (Terms Confirmed)
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a contract in the Ready for Signature (Terms Confirmed) state on a users notification widget
custom_steps: WHEN a user clicks the description of the given contract
custom_expected: THEN the contract loads in view mode

title: Open Approved Contract from Notifications widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is an Approved contract on a users notification widget
custom_steps: WHEN a user clicks the description of the given contract
custom_expected: THEN the contract loads in view mode

title: Open Approved for Next year Contract from Notifications widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a contract that is Approved for Next Year on a users notification widget
custom_steps: WHEN a user clicks the description of the given contract
custom_expected: THEN the contract loads in view mode

title: Open Voided Contract from Notifications widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a voided contract on a users notification widget
custom_steps: WHEN a user clicks the description of the given contract
custom_expected: THEN the contract loads in view mode

title: Open a manually expired Contract  from the Notifications Widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is an Expired contract on a users notifications widget
custom_steps: WHEN a user clicks the description of the given contract
custom_expected: THEN the contract loads in view mode

title: Open a player's profile from the Notifications widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a contract in any state a user wants to open
custom_steps: WHEN a user clicks the name of the given contract
custom_expected: THEN the page reloads to the players profile

title: Save contract with a Custom language
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a contract that contains Custom language
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Save
custom_expected: THEN the contract should be saved and entered language should be stored as part of the contract

title: Try to create new contract if player does not belong to the users same org
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is logged in as NYY
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to create Major Contract for ARI player
custom_expected: THEN the system gives them an error message [blocker error 54]

title: Try to create new contract if player that is a Free Agent
custom_preconds: GIVEN the player does not belong to any organizations, making him a free agent
custom_steps: WHEN a new contract is created for that given player
custom_expected: THEN the contract can be saved and submitted successfully

title: Try to create a new contract for an international player who is 17
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the player is 17 years old 
AND is an international player
custom_steps: WHEN a new contract is created for that given player
custom_expected: THEN contract can be saved and submitted succesfully

title: Try to create a new contract for an international player who is under 16 yrs old
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the player is not yet 16 yrs old
AND is an international player
custom_steps: WHEN a new contract is created for that given player
custom_expected: THEN an error message is shown and contract is not created

title: Try to create a new contract for an international player who will not be 17 by September 1
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to create a contract for a player
custom_steps:
WHEN the player is international
AND their birthday is 8/31/2001
custom_expected: THEN user receives error, Player must be 17 years old by Sept 1st

title: Rule 5 test
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Rule 5 draft excluded or major league phase selected player is non-tendered (R5 status of Draft Excluded or Selected AND FA type XXA (2C))
AND current date is between tender date and March 15 of the following calendar year
custom_steps: WHEN a user from the same organization attempts to create a major contract
custom_expected: THEN the user is unable to create contract and Blocker Error 6 is shown

title: Try to create a contract for a player that already has a preliminary contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is already a preliminary contract for a player
custom_steps: WHEN a user attempts to create another preliminary contract for that player
custom_expected: THEN user receives an error message [Blocker Error 7]

title: Club user can view Action items widget
custom_preconds: Given the user has club permissions
custom_steps: When the club user logs in
custom_expected: They will see the Action Items widget

title: Club user receives Action item when MJC reaches an Update Pending Approval (Terms Confirmed) state
custom_preconds: Given the club admin user has logged in
custom_steps: WHEN the contract for a player of the signing org reaches an Update Pending Approval (Terms Confirmed State)
custom_expected: THEN the item will appear on the Action Items widget for the Club admin update and resubmit to the LRD

title: Club admin user receives Action item when MJC reaches an Update Pending Approval State
custom_preconds: GIVEN the Club admin user has logged in
custom_steps: WHEN a contract for a player of their org has reached and Update Pending Approval State
custom_expected: THEN the item will appear on the Action items widget for the club to update and resubmit to the LRD

title: Club admin user opens Update Pending Approval (Terms Confirmed) contract from Action items
custom_preconds: GIVEN the club admin user has received and Action item for a contract that reached an Update Pending Approval (Terms Confirmed) contract
custom_steps: WHEN the club admin opens Update Pending Approval (Terms Confirmed) action item
custom_expected: THEN the contract will open in edit mode for the user

title: Club admin user opens Update Pending Approval contract from Action items
custom_preconds: GIVEN the club admin user has received and Action item for a contract that reached an Update Pending Approval contract
custom_steps: WHEN the club admin opens Update Pending Approval action item
custom_expected: THEN the contract will open in edit mode for the user

title: Club user makes updates to Update Pending Approval (Terms Confirm) action item and resubmits to LRD
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Club admin user has received a Update Pending Approval (Terms Confirmed) action item 
AND has opened and made updates to the contract
custom_steps: WHEN the club admin user updates the status to Pending Approval (Terms Confirmed)
custom_expected: THEN the action item will fall off the Action items widget

title: Club user makes updates to Update Pending approval action item and resubmits to LRD
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Club admin user has received a Update Pending Approval action item 
AND has opened and made updates to the contract
custom_steps: WHEN the club admin user updates the status to Pending Approval
custom_expected: THEN the action item will fall off the Action items widget

title: Club user opens player profile from Action Items clipboard
custom_preconds: GIVEN the club user is viewing the Action Items clipboard
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks on a player name
custom_expected: THEN the user will be brought to the Player's profile in the same window and tab

title: Upload a file with an invalid extension
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user needs to upload a file
custom_steps: WHEN they upload a document that is anything other than a PDF
custom_expected:
THEN user receives an error message stating:

"Invalid file format
You are attempting to attach a file type that is not accepted for this form.
Please upload a file in one of the following formats: .pdf"

title: Superceded Contract Overlaps  with another approved contract for multiple years
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player has a superceded contract that ended in 2019
custom_steps: WHEN the LRD user creates and approved a new contract for the player
custom_expected: THEN the contract history will only show the first overlapping year of the contract. It will not show any other overlapping years

title: Terminated Contract overlaps with another contract for multiple years
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player has a terminated contract that ended in 2019
custom_steps: WHEN the LRD user creates and approved a new contract for the player
custom_expected: THEN the contract history will only show the first overlapping year of the terminated contract. It will not show any other overlapping years

title: Superceded contract does not overlap with another contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN a Player has a superceded contract
custom_steps: WHEN a user attempts to create a new contract that does not overlap with existing contract
custom_expected: THEN all contract years will be displayed in player's contract history

title: Terminated Contract does not overlap with another contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN a Player has a terminated contract
custom_steps: WHEN a user attempts to create a new contract that does not overlap with existing contract
custom_expected: THEN all contract years will be displayed in player's contract history
